titleStmt.title: An antidote against the venom of Quakerism, or, Some observations, on a little pamphlet, stiled, The Christianity of the people commonly called Quakers by John Meriton ...
titleStmt.author: Meriton, John, 1666-1717.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by J. Robinson ... and H. Rhodes ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
